name: Hubert's Cave Adventure
description: Hubert's Cave Adventure ----------------------------------------- Take advantage of Huberts bouncy physique to traverse the puzzles of the deep dark mine. -Your goal is to reach the depths of the mine- god knows why- as fast as possible. -Collecting gems preserves your time; if you dont you lose score when you finish. -Both spikes and lava are hazards, and will put you back to your most recent checkpoint. -Yellow-ish walls are pickaxe breakable, while gray-colored walls (no green) are only breakable by tnt. -TNT has a fuse time of 5 seconds, and is set off by hitting it with your pickaxe. -As aforementioned, hubert is bouncy, find out what that means! Controls ----------------------------------------- A + D keys to strafe Spacebar to Jump Mouse Left-Click to throw Pickaxe ESC to restart -DISCLAIMER- The game is very rough, if a tnt does not explode where it is intended, you will need to restart.
